data.eml:eml: Agrilus (Nigritius) scottoi n. sp. from Cameroun (Coleoptera, Buprestidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Curletti, Gianfranco, Dutto, Angelo (2017): Agrilus (Nigritius) scottoi n. sp. from Cameroun (Coleoptera, Buprestidae). Zootaxa 4341 (3): 423-424, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4341.3.7
